• If the mother’s delivery HIV VL ≥ 50 c/mL

o The infant should be re-classified as higher-risk and follow the algorithm for Prophylaxis for the HIV- 
Exposed Infant at Birth in the VTP guideline.
Management of labour 
• W
omen living with HIV can be managed as any other woman in labour, according to the guidelines in other
chapters. As with all woman in labour:
o avoid unnecessary episiot
